description.value:
The shaman understands any spoken language for a number of minutes per day equal to her level, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.jcs7ba5depdyitey]{Comprehend Languages}. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.

At 5th level, a shaman can use this ability to speak any language, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.m1rmcpcaixcpz9ib]{Tongues}.
